name: Zachariah's House
description:
Exploring the idea that obsession and being stuck in the past can grow into a serious problem. The player is trapped in a family member's house after they have become a hermit. They will explore the home and see what happens when untreated trauma and nostalgia takes form in an obsessive hoarding nature.

How to play:

  • Press E to interact with objects
  • wasd to move around
  • use the mouse to rotate the camera
  • press F to use flashlight

Puzzles/rooms

  •  The basement main room is the first puzzle in the game. The player will look around the room for color coded notes. Then the player will match the sequence to the pool balls on the shelf in order to gain the code for the safe. Only when the numbers are put in correctly will the player gain access to a voice recording from Zachariah and be guided to the next room.  
  • designer : Shanice Gamble
  • The garage is the second puzzle of the game. The player will listen to a recording from Zachariah's wife to hear how to solve the puzzle. To solve it the player must find the three objects that trigger the Simpsons toy to rise and talk. There are two notes that will show the color order of the objects and a hint to one of the exact objects. 
  • designer: Aliya Feggins
  • The storage room is the third puzzle in the game. The objective is to find the key in the room.
  •    Designer: Christopher Cain The office is the fourth puzzle. The objective is to find the stake and put it into the painting. 
  • Designer: Anthony Watson
  • Final puzzle to use the numbers found in each room and enter them into the safe to get out of the basement.
